languages.text: {n}Вы перехватываете запястье Маражая, стремясь выбить клинок из его руки. В ответ друкари посылает вам разъяренный взгляд.{/n} "Что ты творишь, мон-кай?! Ты забыл{mf||а} свое место?!"
{n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вы перехватываете запястье Маражая, стремясь выбить клинок из его руки. В ответ друкари посылает вам разъяренный взгляд.{/n} "Что ты творишь, мон-кай?! Ты забыл{mf||а} свое место?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"
{n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"
{n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"
{n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"

languages.text: {n}你抓住玛拉斋的手腕，试图夺下他手中的利刃。他愤怒地瞪着你。{/n}“你到底在干什么，猴子？难道你忘记自己的身份了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}你抓住玛拉斋的手腕，试图夺下他手中的利刃。他愤怒地瞪着你。{/n}“你到底在干什么，猴子？难道你忘记自己的身份了吗？”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの手首を掴み、手から刃を引き抜こうとする。彼は憤慨してあなたを睨みつける。{/n}「何をしている、モン＝ケイ？自分の立場を忘れたか？」
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの手首を掴み、手から刃を引き抜こうとする。彼は憤慨してあなたを睨みつける。{/n}「何をしている、モン＝ケイ？自分の立場を忘れたか？」

languages.text: {n}Agarras a Marazhai de la muñeca, intentando arrebatarle el puñal de la mano. Él te lanza una mirada iracunda.{/n} «¿Qué estás haciendo, mon-keigh? ¿Has olvidado cuál es tu lugar?».
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Agarras a Marazhai de la muñeca, intentando arrebatarle el puñal de la mano. Él te lanza una mirada iracunda.{/n} «¿Qué estás haciendo, mon-keigh? ¿Has olvidado cuál es tu lugar?».

languages.text: {n}Vous saisissez Marazhai par le poignet pour tenter de lui arracher son arme. Il vous foudroie d'un regard outragé.{/n} « Qu'est-ce qui vous prend, mon-keigh ? Auriez-vous oublié qui est le maître, ici ? »
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous saisissez Marazhai par le poignet pour tenter de lui arracher son arme. Il vous foudroie d'un regard outragé.{/n} « Qu'est-ce qui vous prend, mon-keigh ? Auriez-vous oublié qui est le maître, ici ? »

languages.text: {n}Du greifst nach Marazhais Handgelenk und versuchst ihm die Klinge aus der Hand zu reißen. Er starrt dich empört an.{/n} "Was tut Ihr da, Chem-Pan-Sey? Habt Ihr vergessen, wo Ihr hingehört?"
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Du greifst nach Marazhais Handgelenk und versuchst ihm die Klinge aus der Hand zu reißen. Er starrt dich empört an.{/n} "Was tut Ihr da, Chem-Pan-Sey? Habt Ihr vergessen, wo Ihr hingehört?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın elindeki bıçağı almaya çalışarak bileğini kavrıyorsun. Sana hiddetle, ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Ne yapıyorsun mon-keigh? Yerini unuttun mu yoksa?"
languages.original_text: {n}You seize Marazhai's wrist, seeking to remove the blade from his hand. He glares at you in outrage.{/n} "What are you doing, mon-keigh? Have you forgotten your place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın elindeki bıçağı almaya çalışarak bileğini kavrıyorsun. Sana hiddetle ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Ne yapıyorsun mon-keigh? Yerini unuttun mu yoksa?"
